attributes.action: Stop mps from robbing tax payers through expenses claims!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should mps get to spend excessive amounts of our wages, taken in taxes and spend them on luxurys that most people dream about, and some even struggling to keep there houses. That money they paid in taxes could make all the difference to them, instead some mps are spending it on gardens and swimming pools! Something has to change!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
